examples.example: 我早就准备好了去迎接新的挑战。

translate.english: I have long been ready to meet new challenges.

examples.example: 我早就计划好这个假期要去远方旅行。

translate.english: I have long planned to travel far away during this vacation.

examples.example: 我早就期待着能和朋友们一起度过这个愉快的周末。

translate.english: I have long been looking forward to spending this pleasant weekend with friends.
